媋字的基本解释

媋
chūn
女子貌美。
古女子人名用字。

媋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chūn］
［《集韻》樞倫切，平諄，昌。］
(1)女子容貌美丽。
(2)女子名用字。

媋字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　媋； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页266第26
【集韻】樞倫切，音春。女字。一曰女美也。　又式勻切，舜平聲。義?同。

媋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
媋字的起名意思

女子容貌美丽；女子名用字。

Ming
Basic explanation of words
Ming
chūn
The woman is beautiful.
Ancient women's names used characters.
Ming
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chūn］
["Jiyun" Shulunqie, flat and prosperous. ]
(1) Women are beautiful in appearance.
(2) Words used in women's names.
Ming
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　媋; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 266 26
[Ji Yun] Shu Lun cut, sound spring. Female characters. One said that women are beautiful.　The style is evenly cut again, and Shun is flat. Righteous? Same.
